textBeforeTable: Flat view Next unread Next Previous First Parent Forum Complain Reply to thread   Reply with quote   Thanks a lot for your time and help Has anyone used inks from fotorite .I found them on Amazon.Uk and they seem to be a serious company with good ratings. Is their ink any good ? I think refillable cartridges would suit me more as I would not have ink bottles lying around waiting to be knocked over by my two kids.
